CAW President Ken Lewenza said Monday that the employees appreciate the recognition.. I think it's a vote of confidence for the direction of Chrysler corporation and obviously Sergio Marchionne appreciates the kind of work ethic that has been developing in the plants in terms of changing its culture, said Lewenza. CAW Local 444 President Rick Laporte reiterated there is no question the workers have helped put the company on the right track, but he was a little concerned about the bonus idea.
